title.rendered: ABC Honors Alticor Inc with National Diversity Excellence Award

content.rendered:
Associated Builders and Contractors (ABC) announced that Alticor Inc showed a commitment to diversity that has earned it a National Diversity Excellence Award in the General Contractor category.
“ABC stated it is honored to award Alticor Inc with a National Diversity Excellence Award for an ongoing commitment to developing and sustaining a diverse construction workforce, supplier chain and community with best in-class recruitment policies, retention practices, and training and mentoring programs,” said ABC President and CEO Michael D. Bellaman.
The winning company, judged from entries submitted from across the nation, was judged based on the diversity of the company; a focus on diversity in hiring practices, training and retention; and contractor/vendor relationships; among other criteria. The ABC National Diversity Excellence Award in the General Contractor category has been in existence for two years; Alticor Inc. has been the recipient for both years.

excerpt.rendered: Associated Builders and Contractors (ABC) announced that Alticor Inc showed a commitment to diversity that has earned it a National Diversity Excellence Award in the General Contractor category.
